member.name: PaletteFlags
member.summary: The PaletteFlags enumeration indicates attributes of the color data in a palette.

member.name: PaletteFlags.PaletteFlagsHasAlpha
member.summary: Indicates that one or more of the palette entries contains alpha (transparency) information.

member.name: PaletteFlags.PaletteFlagsGrayScale
member.summary: Indicates that the palette contains only grayscale entries.

member.name: PaletteFlags.PaletteFlagsHalftone
member.summary: Indicates that the palette is the Windows halftone palette.
